articles.author: Larry Madowo
articles.title: The convicted murderer suspected of faking his own death in a South African prison fire - CNN
articles.description: If this were the plot of a movie, it would be too far-fetched to be believable. South African authorities have taken over management of a maximum-security prison run by a private British security firm after a high-profile convicted murderer was accused of fak…
articles.content:
